name: aiflow – AI for WooCommerce – Powerful AI Content Generator
author: FirstMedia Solutions GmbH

sections.description:
Save Time and Money on Writing Product Description with Our WooCommerce Plugin

Writing compelling product descriptions can be a challenge, especially when you’re managing a WooCommerce store with dozens or even hundreds of products. But what if there was an easier way to create descriptions that are both informative and engaging for your customers?

Unlock the power of AI

By harnessing the power of AI language generation, we’ve created a tool that generates high-quality product descriptions for your store in seconds. Our plugin integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce, making it easy to use directly from your wordpress site.
www.aiflow.ai

With the Free Version you can generate 10 product descriptions.

awesome features of Aiflow

Effortlessly create compelling product descriptions with advanced AI technology – optimize for SEO, increase sales, and save time with our feature-rich plugin directly from your Worpdress Store

AI Product Description

Create unique product descriptions in seconds
Improve your Existing Product Description
Let Aiflow revise and improve your existing product description

Optimize your Description for SEO

Tell Aiflow your desired keywords and it will automatically integrate them into the product description.
alternative Product descriptions in a different Style
Choose from different writing styles for your product descriptions

COMING SOON:

Meta Description

Let Aiflow create a meta description optimized for SEO

Product-Tags

Aiflow automatically sets appropriate product tags for your products to boost your sales

Product Title

Generate an alternative Product Title for your Products

KeyWords

Generate relevant keywords for product descriptions and integrate them into the text

Donations
sections.installation:
1. Download and Activate the Plugin in your WooCommerce WordPress Installation
  2. Go to Settings and connect your account
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

-Bugfixes
-Fixed description not generating issue

1.0.3

-Migration to new AI and v2-API
-Translations extended, aiflow now works with all supported languages

1.0.2

-Bugfixes

1.0.1

-Release with description regenerate + optimize description for seo
